CB4X Concept, untuk 'Biker' yang Suka Meliuk-liuk
07 Nov 2019, 09:09 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Honda CB4X Concept di pameran motor EICMA 2019. (Foto: Dok. Honda)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- HondaÂ CB4X Concept mengguncang lantai EICMA 2019 berlangsung di kota Milan mulai 5-10 November. Motor dengan profil jangkung dan berotot ini didesain oleh pusat Riset dan Pengembangan Honda di Roma.CB4X Concept menggunakan mesin empat silinder segaris yang juga digunakan oleh CBR650. Oleh pabrikan, auranya dibuat sebagai motor petualang yang asyik diajak touring melahap tikungan dan perjalanan panjang, namun juga nyaman digunakan setiap hari di rute perkotaan.Untuk menopang aktivitas itu, pabrikan menggunakan subframe aluminium yang telah disesuaikan. Rangka itu dikencani single swing arm dan suspensi depan dengan ukuran travel cukup panjang. Untuk lingkar roda depan mengandalkan pelek 17 inci.


Honda CB4X Concept di pameran motor EICMA 2019. (Foto: Dok. Honda)

Hasil rekayasa insinyur Honda, tangki bahan bakar membungkuk ke depan, diibaratkan pemanufaktur seperti seekor kobra yang siap menyerang mangsanya, sementara windscreen dapat disesuaikan dan terintegrasi ke dalam fairing.Lampu depan motor konsep ini sudah menggunakan Daytime Running Lights (DRL)."Honda CB4X adalah sebuah ide yang didedikasikan untuk para pengendara yang suka mengendarai motor sport, namun tidak ingin merelakan pengalaman berkendara yang menyenangkan kapan pun dan di mana pun," tulis Honda dalam keterangan resmi. (ryh/mik)

CB4X Concept, for 'Biker' who likes to writhe
Nov 7 2019, 09:09 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Honda CB4X Concept at the 2019 EICMA motorcycle exhibition. (Photo: Doc. Honda)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - The Honda CB4X Concept shakes up the EICMA 2019 floor taking place in Milan from 5-10 November. This tall, muscular profile motorbike was designed by the Honda Research and Development center in Rome. CB4X Concept uses a inline four-cylinder engine which is also used by the CBR650. By the manufacturer, the aura is made as an adventurous motorbike that is invited touring to devour long bends and trips, but is also convenient to use every day on urban routes. To sustain the activity, the manufacturer uses an aluminum subframe that has been adjusted. The frame was dated by a single swing arm and front suspension with a fairly long travel size. For the circumference of the front wheels rely on 17-inch rims.


Honda CB4X Concept at the 2019 EICMA motorcycle exhibition. (Photo: Doc. Honda)

Engineered by Honda engineers, the fuel tank leaned forward, likened to a manufacturer like a cobra ready to attack its prey, while the windscreen can be adjusted and integrated into the fairing. The front motorbike of this concept already uses Daytime Running Lights (DRL). "Honda CB4X is "an idea dedicated to motorists who like to drive motor sports, but don't want to give up a pleasant driving experience anytime and anywhere," Honda wrote in an official statement. (ryh / mic)
